{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-879 |revision=A1 |asin=B00PVDO8YK |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/09/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR879A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR879A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198CS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model= |fla2=16 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F1G1664A-DEB |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8194AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8814AR |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85405;;3; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85606-11;;4; |flags=SU-MIMO |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1900 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1900-wi-fi-router-2/ Product page] (US)
===Overview=== *Performance – AC1900 Dual Band Wi-Fi Performance *Coverage – Extreme Coverage and Range with High Power Amplifiers *Latest technology – AC SmartBeam and SmartConnect *Unique design – Premium Stylish Design *Fast wired connections – Gigabit Ethernet Ports<small> *High-power amplifiers (1000mW) - Wider coverage throughout your home *SmartConnect - Band steering balances wireless devices among the two wireless bands *Smart Beam Forming - Dramatically enhances wireless signal strength and throughput *Dual Core Processor - Faster wireless speeds, improved coverage and reliable connections *Dual Band Wireless - Surf the internet on 2.4GHz band while streaming HD on 5GHz band *Built-in gigabit ports - Fast and reliable wired connections *Intelligent QoS - Device optimization delivers seamless performance for applications *Eliminate dead zones - Full coverage to reach dead zone in home environment</small>
===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1900 ultimate AC performance (600+1300 Mbps) * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5GHz, 600Mbps (2.4GHz) + 1300Mbps (5GHz) * Data Rate: 802.11n: up to 600Mbps, 802.11ac: up to 1300Mbps * Antenna: 4x transmit (3x)/receive (4x) fixed internal antennas * Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN (10/100/1000Mbps), USB (no) * Power Adapter: Input: 100~240VAC, 50/60Hz, Output: 12VDC/1.5A (2A)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32995-dlink-dir-879-ac1900-exo-wifi-router-reviewed ''D-Link DIR-879 AC1900 EXO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8198C @1GHz MIPS1074K Dual-Core (5x GbE) :RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 128MB (NAND)/16MB (SPI) :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8194AR (2.4GHz), [[Realtek]] RTL8814AR (5GHz) :*2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8194AR 4x4 3 stream 2.4GHz SoC :- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x3) :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4) :*5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8814AR 4x4 3 stream 5GHz SoC :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x3) :- [[Skyworks]] SKY85606-11 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4)
===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32925-d-link-ces-2016-announcements ''D-Link CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[D-Link DIR-869]] - ''AC1750 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz) {$129.99} :[[D-Link DIR-879]] - ''AC1900 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 600Mbps (2.4GHz) {$149.99} ::RTL8198CS / RTL8814AR / RTL8194AR - [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9974/dlink-demonstrates-innovative-networking-solutions-at-ces PR] *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/unified-home-wi-fi-network-kit/ ''Unified Home Wi-Fi Network Kit DKT-891 - CES 2016'' on '''D-Link'''] (US) :[[D-Link DIR-891L]] - ''AC4300 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' {$369.99} ::2x 1733Mbps (5GHz) and 800Mbps (2.4GHz), Qualcomm MU|EFX :[[D-Link DAP-1655]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-Fi Extender'' ::867Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz)
===See also=== *[[D-Link DIR-885L/R]] - ''AC3100 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' *[[D-Link DIR-890L/R]] - ''AC3200 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' *[[D-Link DIR-895L/R]] - ''AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' *[[D-Link DWA-192]] - ''AC1900 Wi-Fi USB Adapter''
